term.title: Bunnett–Olsen equations

item.text: The equations for the relation between log10([SH+]/[S]) + H0 and log10[H+] + H0 for base S in aqueous mineral acid solution, where H0 is Hammett's acidity function and log10[H+] + H0 represents the activity function log10(γS.γH+)/γ.SH+ for the nitroaniline reference bases to build H0.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1091 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
